original_title: Ich sah ihn mit meinen Augen (AT)
overview: In a rural area, a young man is picked up hitchhiking by a young lonely woman. He tells her that he got lost on a backpacking trip and she agrees to bring him to the nearest train station. He makes a very friendly impression, but secretly he seems to pursusing something completely different.
title: Ich sah ihn mit meinen Augen (AT)
